taxonomicnotes: Blyth (1860) described Cobitis rubidipinnis from Rangoon (or possibly Mandalay), Myanmar.  Kottelat (1990) put the species under Acanthocobitis Peters.
rationale: Acanthocobitis rubidipinnis is a widely distributed species throughout Myanmar with no major widespread threats affecting its population.  It is therefore assessed as Least Concern.
evaluator: Barbhuiya, A.H., Rema Devi, K.R., Dahanukar, N., Chaudhry, S. & Juffe Bignoli, D.
